title: Lorem Ipsum Dolor Sit Amet
description: Idemitsu is thrilled to announce the highly anticipated launch of Idemitsu Brand Motor Oil (IBMO) in Pakistan.
details_para_one: Idemitsu Lube Pakistan (Private) Limited, a subsidiary of Idemitsu Kosan Co. Japan. A renowned name in the lubricants industry and the No.1 Japanese Company in Global Lubricant Sales. This launch marks a significant milestone as Idemitsu expands its regional presence and brings its renowned product line to Pakistani consumers.
details_para_two: As a trusted and globally recognized brand, Idemitsu has a rich history of over 110 years in oil development and its cutting-edge technology and commitment to excellence. Now, Pakistani consumers will have access to the superior performance and reliability of Idemitsu Brand Motor Oil. Idemitsu Brand Motor Oil (IBMO) is specifically engineered to meet the demanding requirements of modern and conventional engines, offering optimal protection and performance in various driving conditions. It's advanced formulation, and high-quality base oils ensure superior lubrication, fuel economy, eco-friendliness, reducing friction and enhancing engine durability. The launch event of Idemitsu Brand Motor Oil (IBMO) in Lahore, Pakistan, reflects Idemitsu's commitment to delivering premium lubricant solutions to customers worldwide. By introducing its new product lineups, Idemitsu for Gasoline (IFG) for passenger cars, Idemitsu for Dual Engines (IFD) for commercial vehicles, and Idemitsu Racing Gasoline (IRG) for motorcycles. Idemitsu aims to cater to the growing needs of Pakistani motorists, providing them with a trusted and reliable partner for their engine maintenance while also being considerate to the environment and society. Thus, it ensures that Pakistani consumers receive the best-in-class service that aligns with the high standards set by Idemitsu. It is not noteworthy that Idemitsu is already a leading Genuine Oil supplier in Pakistan, and now the only Japanese Energy Company based in Pakistan has officially launched its branded lubricants business in Pakistan.
